helpText: ä_Edit, delete, or reorder categories in your organization______________________________Ü.

generic.title: ä_Error updating categories__________________________Ü
generic.message: ä_Something went wrong. Please try again later________________________Ü.

maxDepthExceeded.title: ä_Error updating categories__________________________Ü
maxDepthExceeded.message: ä_You cannot nest categories more than 2 levels deep___________________________Ü.

destinationHasSameName.title: ä_Error updating categories__________________________Ü
destinationHasSameName.message: ä_A category with the same name already exists in the destination category______________________________________Ü.

noSchema.title: ä_Schema not found_________________Ü
noSchema.message: ä_Item schema not found for user_________________Ü.

maxCharacter.title: ä_Error updating categories__________________________Ü
maxCharacter.message: ä_Category names can be a maximum of ${maxCharacter} characters long___________________________________Ü.

deleteInUseCategory.title: ä_Delete category________________Ü
deleteInUseCategory.message: ä_${numItem} items are assigned to this category. Deleting the category will also remove it from these items_______________________________________________________Ü.

custom.title: ä_Custom categories__________________Ü
custom.message: ä_Create your own categories to organize content within your organization_____________________________________Ü.

arcgis.title: ä_ArcGIS categories__________________Ü
arcgis.message: ä_ArcGIS categories include a selection of topic categories and subcategories that can be used to categorize many types of geospatial content. These categories are used to support ArcGIS Living Atlas of the World___________________________________________________________________________________________________________Ü.

iso.title: ä_ISO categories_______________Ü
iso.message: ä_ISO categories includes topic categories from the International Organization for Standardization that provide a method for describing and cataloging geographic information_______________________________________________________________________________________Ü.

inspire.title: ä_INSPIRE categories___________________Ü
inspire.message: ä_INSPIRE categories include a comprehensive set of spatial data themes set out in the INSPIRE Directive_____________________________________________________Ü.
